entry.title: What's new in Deep Learning?
entry.summary:
Description

PyData Berlin 2016

@karpathy's recent tweet "BatchNorm, STN, DCGAN, DRAW, soft/hard attention, char-rnn, DeepDream, NeuralStyle, TensorFlow, ResNet, AlphaGo.. a lot happened over 1 year" sums up the many new aspects of Deep Learning research.

In this talk I will review some of the highlights of deep learning in the context of Python deep learning frameworks.

Slides: https://www.dropbox.com/s/b6lgvq6ijlutii4/new-deep-learning.pdf?dl=0

entry.title: Intro to ConvNets
entry.summary:
Summary

We will give an introduction to the recent development of Deep Neural Networks and focus in particular on Convolution Networks which are well suited to image classification problems. We will also provide you with the practical knowledge of how to get started with using ConvNets via the cuda-convnet python library.
